Tourguide step 1 title: How to follow a Coorpacademy course?
Tourguide step 1 content:
Coorpacademy courses are based on flipped learning, which adapts to your profile and the way you learn. üéì
In practice:
  • you start with 4 questions,
  • each question comes with learning resources.
Tourguide step 2 content: Why? If you get it right, you can finish your course faster! üöÄ
Tourguide step 3 content:
When you don't have the answer, you can find the lesson here. üîé
It can be a video, audio, or PDF.
Tourguide step 4 content: Find a clue to help you answer the question. üí°
Tourguide step 5 content: Use this menu to switch the language at any time during the experience. üåç
Tourguide step 6 content: You can reopen this tour guide anytime by clicking the Help button. üí°
Tourguide step 7 title: You are allowed to make mistakes!
Tourguide step 7 content:
For each wrong answer, you lose a life. üíî
But it's not game over, you can keep going!
